title: How to Make Slow Cooker Au Gratin Potatoes and Ham

steps.headline: Make the potato layers.
steps.description: Divide the ham, potatoes, onions, and cheese portions in half. Layer each one of them on top of another in the slow cooker.

steps.headline: Make the soup mixture.
steps.description: Mix the milk, cream of mushroom soup, and thyme in a small bowl.

steps.headline: Pour the mixture on top of the potato layers.
Set the slow cooker on high for one hour.
Cook on low for 6 to 8 hours.
steps.description: You'll want the potatoes to be tender in the end.

text: Make the potato layers. Divide the ham, potatoes, onions, and cheese portions in half. Layer each one of them on top of another in the slow cooker. Make the soup mixture. Mix the milk, cream of mushroom soup, and thyme in a small bowl. Pour the mixture on top of the potato layers.  Set the slow cooker on high for one hour.  Cook on low for 6 to 8 hours. You'll want the potatoes to be tender in the end.
